channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The whole of priors road is full of dangerous potholes making people drive on the wrong side of the road. It’s an absolute disgrace., 4th March
item.description:
You resurfaced Mill Lane, past the expensive houses, which hardly needed it but neglect the wider, more used road past the council houses!! Wonder why! This road has been in a sad state of affairs for MONTHS AND MONTHS.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109, Bouncers Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
As above

item.title: 2 potholes near the edge of the road on Leckhampton Hill, 4th March
item.description:
In front of the new build, just up from the house, where there is an access point into the land to the side of the new house. One has been present for many weeks and now there are now 2 potholes next to each other. On the side of the carriageway heading away from Cheltenham towards Birdlip Air Balloon roundabout.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large and deep pothole near centre of road, 4th March
item.description:
Southbound carriageway of Albert Road, near the parking zone. Pothole is near the centre of the road and is unavoidable when manouvering around parked cars. Pothole has been present for several weeks - I've hit it 3 times but kept forgetting to report it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The whole end of Priors Road is a disgrace it’s now dangerous, 4th March
item.description:
Whole road is torn up, you have to swerve and avoid oncoming traffic. The previous poor repairs have gone. Either it’s poor work by contractors or not being checked. Council Officer in charge needs to be held to account.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole causing water to accumulate near bus stop, 4th March
item.description:
Large expanse of water gathering in large pothole directly in in front of bus stop causing splashing of pedestrians and those waiting for buses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Birdlip, Cotswold

item.title: Metal Cover in Road, Nosiy, 4th March
item.description:
Metal cover towards end of close, becoming noisy when driven over by larger vehicles, causing disturbance
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cousley Close, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic Light Sequencing Issues, 4th March
item.description:
Since the resurfacing works have been undertaken there are issues with: Lights in Carisbrook Rd not letting cars go, missing a sequence on 1-2 light change cycles, leading to cars backing up on Carisbrooke Rd and into Billbrook Rd. Lights on Hucclecote Rd and junction with Churchdown Lane/Carslisbrooke Rd, travelling towards Delta Way from Barnwood, only letting 3-4 cars pass but traffic light on other direction towards Barnwood is on green for a lot longer. Took me 15 minutes to travel from Wagon & Horses to Green Lane today.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carisbrooke Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.description:

item.title: Temporary Traffic Lights with no information board, 4th March
item.description:
Temporary lights on Station Road, Churchdown due to Wales and West Utility work have no contact information for reporting outages. The lights are already causing considerable tailbacks due to the proximity to the 4 schools within the area. Contractors onsite claim that they are unable to adjust the timing to prevent queues backing on to Pirton Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Information board identifying emergency contact company/number not displayed

item.title: Street light is permanently out problem, 4th March
item.description:
All Street Lights out, terrible lighting without them and the footway and carriageway are so uneven.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 4th March
item.description:
Carriageway is worn out, and hasn't been looked at for at least 20 year. This road has a large volume with both vehicular and foot traffic.
Report on FixMyStreet
